topic.title: Edit a user's account settings
topic.shortdesc: Information about editing user accounts, passwords, and contact information.

body.p: You can view and edit contact information, specify a password, view web services information, and exclude this computer from data collection.
Click your login name at the top right, then click Account Settings.
All users have access to the Account Information page. The following information is available to view or edit:

entry.p: Specify the following personal information for your account:
Displays the account username, and lets you change the account password.

Displays the web services username and shared secret associated with this account. Use these credentials when accessing Marketing Cloud through the web services APIs. For more information, see the Developer Connection.

p.note: This information is displayed only if the account is authorized as a web services user.

entry.p: Applies a cookie to the current computer to exclude it from data collection. This is useful if you do not want your on-line activities to affect Page View and Visitor counts in your domain.

p.note: To use this feature, your browser must have cookies enabled. If you delete cookies on your computer, you must reset the exclusion cookie.
